comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Yikes for the listed topic "Cerebral palsied children"-- not quite current terminology there!  Can't imagine it would be much use as a search term, even.   I do disability history; I might look up "cerebral palsy" or "disability"  or "disabled"--and in historical texts, I might even search "crippled" or "handicapped"--but "palsied"?

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Hi Penny-

Thank you for the catch--we all agree with you here that not only is "palsied" not a useful search term, but more importantly, it's not accurate or sensitive. When we import images to Flickr, it automatically pulls over image metadata, which is often very old--clearly what happened above. We've changed it, and we thank you!

Best,
Catherine Shteynberg
Smithsonian Institution Archives
